channel.title: FULL pickpocketing!
channel.description:
I just finished FULL pickpocketing. It uses every NPC that runescape has(if they're in 317, that is). It's actually VERY simple. I have one void and then one function with a bunch of parameters. It also lets me specify up to three items to give to the player, and the player has a one in four chance of receiving those items--a different chance for each different item. It also lets me specify the QUANTITY to give to the player. I even have it base the chance of failure based off of the player's level, and a "maxlevel" variable that defines when the player will stop failing.
Some pictures: [img]http://img227.imageshack.us/img227/8083/proof2m.png[/img] [img]http://img139.imageshack.us/img139/1139/proof1g.png[/img]
